title.rendered: Our Website is Closed on Sundays!

content.rendered:
Hey sticker friends! ⭐ Our website is closed on Sundays ⭐
As some of y’all might recall, back in 2020, we made the decision to close our websites on Sundays!
[blog post from that era in time here]

tbh, this is one of our favorite business practices! It really allows breathing room for our team to not be overloaded with processing orders on Mondays, allowing us the ability to give better care and attention to y’all’s beautiful artwork! 🥰 Fun fact: we do all our white ink layers by hand!! While this may be fairly time consuming, the finished result is more than worth it ♡

Producing high quality stickers is very important to us and the ability to close our website on Sundays give us more ability to offer a better, friendlier service.

Thank you for supporting our business! We are forever grateful for the love, kindness, and compassion folks show us and it truly makes a difference in our lives ♡
